commit.message: Move category to bottom of library item page

files.patch:
@@ -2,28 +2,29 @@ div
   .library-container
     .document-view-container.e2e-library-item(data-library-item-uid="{{libraryItem.uid}}", data-library-item-type="{{libraryItem.type.typeName}}")
       .document-view.changeable
+        .template-contents.e2e-library-item-contents(ng-class="libraryItem.frozen ? 'frozen' : ''")
+          h2 {{libraryItem.type.label}} item
+          .template-content-fields(ng-include="formatInclude(libraryItem)")
         .form-container
-          h2 Meta
+          h2 Status
           .form-item
             label(for="e2e-categories") Category
             select#e2e-categories(qen-chosen data-placeholder="Choose category...", multiple
             class="chosen-select", ng-model="libraryItem.categories",
             ng-options="c as c.label for c in categories track by c.label")
-        .template-contents.e2e-library-item-contents(ng-class="libraryItem.frozen ? 'frozen' : ''")
-          h2 Item content
-          .template-content-fields(ng-include="formatInclude(libraryItem)")
-        .form-container
-          h2 Status
-          .form-item
-            label(for="valid-from") Valid from
-            div
-              input#valid-from(type="date", ng-model='libraryItem.validFrom')
-              qen-error(object="libraryItem", field="validFrom")
           .form-item
-            label(for="valid-to") Valid to
-            div
-              input#valid-to(type="date", ng-model='libraryItem.validTo')
-              qen-error(object="libraryItem", field="validTo")
+            .valid-date
+              label(for="valid-from") Valid from
+              div
+                input#valid-from(type="date", ng-model='libraryItem.validFrom')
+                div
+                  qen-error(object="libraryItem", field="validFrom")
+            .valid-date
+              label(for="valid-to") Valid to
+              div
+                input#valid-to(type="date", ng-model='libraryItem.validTo')
+                div
+                  qen-error(object="libraryItem", field="validTo")
           .form-item
             label(for="library-activity") Active
             label.ios-switch-container
